page.title: 13Littlecote House
page.content: On Tuesday 16th of July we went to Littlecote house. When we got there we were met by a guide. The first room that we went into looked most exciting {"The Great Hall" This room had a very tall ceiling.I looked around the walls of the room. Covering one whole wall was a set of about twenty flintlock guns.There were also some beautiful round shields and some leather tunics.They are a full set of Roundhead uniforms which {Colonel Popham}had made for his {Roundhead army.}After the Civil War, they were put in an attic and forgotten. They were found years later and are now the best collection of Cromwellian{armour}in Britain. Then the guide asked us if we would turn round to look at a painting
